summary: The U.S. African Development Foundation aims to promote local economic growth in Africa by increasing incomes and supporting the availability of food, energy, and employment—especially for women and youth. But the Foundation has no strategic approach for mitigating fraud, waste, or abuse in its operations and doesn't have staff to implement such a strategy. Further, the Foundation had some overall policies and procedures to guide...
title: U.S. African Development Foundation: Strategic Approach Needed to Mitigate Fraud Risks
